name: Alphabetic
description: A point and click Puzzle Game. Click On the Bulbs to Lit it up. With Bulbs as dots or points you have to guess the Letters and make it. A casula fun game that will keep on haunting you as well as for children to cognate better and a simple alphabetic puzzle game. a little on the hardware side, this is a simple casual game. for adults. for kids. plenty of stages for you to play on. not sure whether you can make it to the end.
